verses.text_plain: Keep silence before me, O islands; and let the people renew their strength: let them come near; then let them speak: let us come near together to judgment.
verses.verse_html: 1Keep silence before me, O islands; and let the people renew their strength: let them come near; then let them speak: let us come near together to judgment.

verses.text_plain: Who raised up the righteous man from the east, called him to his foot, gave the nations before him, and made him rule over kings? he gave them as the dust to his sword, and as driven stubble to his bow.
verses.verse_html:
2Who raised up the righteous man from the east, called him to his foot, gave the nations before him, and made him rule over kings? he gave them as the dust to his sword, and as driven stubble to his bow. ▼
▼ the righteous…: Heb. righteousness

footnotes.body_html: ▼ the righteous…: Heb. righteousness

verses.text_plain: He pursued them, and passed safely; even by the way that he had not gone with his feet.
verses.verse_html:
3He pursued them, and passed safely; even by the way that he had not gone with his feet. ▼
▼ safely: Heb. in peace

footnotes.body_html: ▼ safely: Heb. in peace

verses.text_plain: Who hath wrought and done it, calling the generations from the beginning? I the Lord, the first, and with the last; I am he.
verses.verse_html: 4Who hath wrought and done it, calling the generations from the beginning? I the Lord, the first, and with the last; I am he.

verses.text_plain: The isles saw it, and feared; the ends of the earth were afraid, drew near, and came.
verses.verse_html: 5The isles saw it, and feared; the ends of the earth were afraid, drew near, and came.

verses.text_plain: They helped every one his neighbour; and every one said to his brother, Be of good courage.
verses.verse_html:
6They helped every one his neighbour; and every one said to his brother, Be of good courage. ▼
▼ Be…: Heb. Be strong

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Be…: Heb. Be strong

verses.text_plain: So the carpenter encouraged the goldsmith, and he that smootheth with the hammer him that smote the anvil, saying, It is ready for the sodering: and he fastened it with nails, that it should not be moved.
verses.verse_html:
7So the carpenter encouraged the goldsmith, and he that smootheth with the hammer him that smote the anvil, saying, It is ready for the sodering: and he fastened it with nails, that it should not be moved. ▼
▼ goldsmith: or, founder
 , ▼
▼ him…: or, the smiting
 , ▼
▼ saying…: or, saying of the soder, It is good

footnotes.body_html: ▼ him…: or, the smiting

footnotes.body_text: ▼ saying…: or, saying of the soder, It is good
footnotes.body_html: ▼ saying…: or, saying of the soder, It is good

verses.text_plain: But thou, Israel, art my servant, Jacob whom I have chosen, the seed of Abraham my friend.
verses.verse_html: 8But thou, Israel, art my servant, Jacob whom I have chosen, the seed of Abraham my friend.

verses.text_plain: Thou whom I have taken from the ends of the earth, and called thee from the chief men thereof, and said unto thee, Thou art my servant; I have chosen thee, and not cast thee away.
verses.verse_html: 9Thou whom I have taken from the ends of the earth, and called thee from the chief men thereof, and said unto thee, Thou art my servant; I have chosen thee, and not cast thee away.

tokens.text: thee, and not cast thee away

verses.text_plain: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
verses.verse_html: 10Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.

verses.text_plain: Behold, all they that were incensed against thee shall be ashamed and confounded: they shall be as nothing; and they that strive with thee shall perish.
verses.verse_html:
11Behold, all they that were incensed against thee shall be ashamed and confounded: they shall be as nothing; and they that strive with thee shall perish. ▼
▼ they that strive…: Heb. the men of thy strife

tokens.text: Behold, all they that were incensed
they shall be as nothing; and they

footnotes.body_text: ▼ they that strive…: Heb. the men of thy strife
footnotes.body_html: ▼ they that strive…: Heb. the men of thy strife

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt seek them, and shalt not find them, even them that contended with thee: they that war against thee shall be as nothing, and as a thing of nought.
verses.verse_html:
12Thou shalt seek them, and shalt not find them, even them that contended with thee: they that war against thee shall be as nothing, and as a thing of nought. ▼
▼ them that…: Heb. the men of thy contention
 , ▼
▼ they…: Heb. the men of thy war

tokens.text: against thee shall be as nothing, and as a thing of nought

footnotes.body_text: ▼ them that…: Heb. the men of thy contention
footnotes.body_html: ▼ them that…: Heb. the men of thy contention

footnotes.body_text: ▼ they…: Heb. the men of thy war
footnotes.body_html: ▼ they…: Heb. the men of thy war

verses.text_plain: For I the Lord thy God will hold thy right hand, saying unto thee, Fear not; I will help thee.
verses.verse_html: 13For I the Lord thy God will hold thy right hand, saying unto thee, Fear not; I will help thee.

verses.text_plain: Fear not, thou worm Jacob, and ye men of Israel; I will help thee, saith the Lord, and thy redeemer, the Holy One of Israel.
verses.verse_html:
14Fear not, thou worm Jacob, and ye men of Israel; I will help thee, saith the Lord, and thy redeemer, the Holy One of Israel. ▼
▼ men: or, few men

footnotes.body_html: ▼ men: or, few men

verses.text_plain: Behold, I will make thee a new sharp threshing instrument having teeth: thou shalt thresh the mountains, and beat them small, and shalt make the hills as chaff.
verses.verse_html:
15Behold, I will make thee a new sharp threshing instrument having teeth: thou shalt thresh the mountains, and beat them small, and shalt make the hills as chaff. ▼
▼ teeth: Heb. mouths

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt fan them, and the wind shall carry them away, and the whirlwind shall scatter them: and thou shalt rejoice in the Lord, and shalt glory in the Holy One of Israel.
verses.verse_html: 16Thou shalt fan them, and the wind shall carry them away, and the whirlwind shall scatter them: and thou shalt rejoice in the Lord, and shalt glory in the Holy One of Israel.

verses.text_plain: When the poor and needy seek water, and there is none, and their tongue faileth for thirst, I the Lord will hear them, I the God of Israel will not forsake them.
verses.verse_html: 17When the poor and needy seek water, and there is none, and their tongue faileth for thirst, I the Lord will hear them, I the God of Israel will not forsake them.

verses.text_plain: I will open rivers in high places, and fountains in the midst of the valleys: I will make the wilderness a pool of water, and the dry land springs of water.
verses.verse_html: 18I will open rivers in high places, and fountains in the midst of the valleys: I will make the wilderness a pool of water, and the dry land springs of water.

verses.text_plain: I will plant in the wilderness the cedar, the shittah tree, and the myrtle, and the oil tree; I will set in the desert the fir tree, and the pine, and the box tree together:
verses.verse_html: 19I will plant in the wilderness the cedar, the shittah tree, and the myrtle, and the oil tree; I will set in the desert the fir tree, and the pine, and the box tree together:

verses.text_plain: That they may see, and know, and consider, and understand together, that the hand of the Lord hath done this, and the Holy One of Israel hath created it.
verses.verse_html: 20That they may see, and know, and consider, and understand together, that the hand of the Lord hath done this, and the Holy One of Israel hath created it.

verses.text_plain: Produce your cause, saith the Lord; bring forth your strong reasons, saith the King of Jacob.
verses.verse_html:
21Produce your cause, saith the Lord; bring forth your strong reasons, saith the King of Jacob. ▼
▼ Produce: Heb. Cause to come near

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Produce: Heb. Cause to come near
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Produce: Heb. Cause to come near

verses.text_plain: Let them bring them forth, and shew us what shall happen: let them shew the former things, what they be, that we may consider them, and know the latter end of them; or declare us things for to come.
verses.verse_html:
22Let them bring them forth, and shew us what shall happen: let them shew the former things, what they be, that we may consider them, and know the latter end of them; or declare us things for to come. ▼
▼ consider…: Heb. set our heart upon them

footnotes.body_text: ▼ consider…: Heb. set our heart upon them
footnotes.body_html: ▼ consider…: Heb. set our heart upon them

verses.text_plain: Shew the things that are to come hereafter, that we may know that ye are gods: yea, do good, or do evil, that we may be dismayed, and behold it together.
verses.verse_html: 23Shew the things that are to come hereafter, that we may know that ye are gods: yea, do good, or do evil, that we may be dismayed, and behold it together.

tokens.text: the things that are to come

verses.text_plain: Behold, ye are of nothing, and your work of nought: an abomination is he that chooseth you.
verses.verse_html:
24Behold, ye are of nothing, and your work of nought: an abomination is he that chooseth you. ▼
▼ of nothing: or, worse than nothing
 , ▼
▼ of nought: or, worse than of a viper

footnotes.body_text: ▼ of nothing: or, worse than nothing
footnotes.body_html: ▼ of nothing: or, worse than nothing

footnotes.body_text: ▼ of nought: or, worse than of a viper
footnotes.body_html: ▼ of nought: or, worse than of a viper

verses.text_plain: I have raised up one from the north, and he shall come: from the rising of the sun shall he call upon my name: and he shall come upon princes as upon morter, and as the potter treadeth clay.
verses.verse_html: 25I have raised up one from the north, and he shall come: from the rising of the sun shall he call upon my name: and he shall come upon princes as upon morter, and as the potter treadeth clay.

verses.text_plain: Who hath declared from the beginning, that we may know? and beforetime, that we may say, He is righteous? yea, there is none that sheweth, yea, there is none that declareth, yea, there is none that heareth your words.
verses.verse_html: 26Who hath declared from the beginning, that we may know? and beforetime, that we may say, He is righteous? yea, there is none that sheweth, yea, there is none that declareth, yea, there is none that heareth your words.

verses.text_plain: The first shall say to Zion, Behold, behold them: and I will give to Jerusalem one that bringeth good tidings.
verses.verse_html: 27The first shall say to Zion, Behold, behold them: and I will give to Jerusalem one that bringeth good tidings.

verses.text_plain: For I beheld, and there was no man; even among them, and there was no counsellor, that, when I asked of them, could answer a word.
verses.verse_html:
28For I beheld, and there was no man; even among them, and there was no counsellor, that, when I asked of them, could answer a word. ▼
▼ answer: Heb. return

verses.text_plain: Behold, they are all vanity; their works are nothing: their molten images are wind and confusion.
verses.verse_html: 29Behold, they are all vanity; their works are nothing: their molten images are wind and confusion.
